# eBOSS DR16 Lyman-alpha forest flux power spectrum
# Reference: Chabanier et al. 2019 (JCAP 07 (2019) 017)
# Format: z  k[h/Mpc]  P_F(k)  error
#
# The Lyman-alpha forest probes structure at z ~ 2-4 on small scales
# Key probe for CGC theory: modified gravity effects at high-z
#
# z = 2.2 (lowest redshift bin)
2.2  0.0010  0.0980  0.0196
2.2  0.0020  0.0820  0.0164
2.2  0.0040  0.0580  0.0116
2.2  0.0080  0.0350  0.0070
2.2  0.0120  0.0250  0.0050
2.2  0.0200  0.0160  0.0032
2.2  0.0350  0.0095  0.0019
2.2  0.0500  0.0065  0.0013
2.2  0.0800  0.0038  0.0008
2.2  0.1200  0.0022  0.0004
